attributes.action: Change the way council's rent is based and not on my wages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I live with my parents in a council house and whilst i was at college paid lodge to my parents towards bills, shopping etc.  Now i am working full time the rental figure now goes on my income.  I am trying to get on the property ladder as a first time buyer but unable to do so as some of my wages go to the Council for rent and my parents still have to pay for shopping and bills without my assistance.
